title.rendered: OneTouch is exhibiting and speaking at the Care Show

content.rendered:
OneTouch is exhibiting and speaking at the Care Show

When: 🗓 24-25 April

Where: 📍Excel, London

Excitement is building around OneTouch as we’re busy getting ready for our next event – the Care Show at Excel, London. We look forward to welcoming you all to Stand K42. If you are going to be at this event please do stop by to say hello and learn exactly what the OneTouch Solution can do to help your care organisation.

We also can’t wait to see our very own Head of Strategy, Richard Green, deliver a keynote presentation on the ‘Use of Technology to Nurture and Build Human Connections in Care Organisations’. We’ll hope to see you all there at the Keynote Stage at 1:45 pm on the 25th April!

Richard will be taking a look at the nuanced human advantages of embracing a Digital Care Management system. With a remarkable professional trajectory spanning from initial roles to managerial positions within care organisations, Richard brings invaluable insights into the transformative effects of technology on individuals within the care sector.

Having experienced the transition from paper-based to fully digital solutions first hand, Richard will shed light on the often unheralded benefits of digitisation across various dimensions of social care. Richard will also demonstrate how our system goes beyond mere time and cost savings, offering efficiency gains, operational enhancements, and fostering positive cultures within care organisations.

During this session, you’ll gain insights into the diverse advantages offered by OneTouch, while also understanding the multitude of HR benefits associated with adopting it as your preferred supplier. Richard’s extensive experience and expertise make him a well-respected figure in the healthcare industry.

Don’t miss out on this opportunity to explore the intersection of technology and human connection in care organisations! Join us for Richard’s keynote and be part of the conversation driving innovation in healthcare.

excerpt.rendered: We’re heading to the Care Show at Excel, London on the 24th and 25th April. Come see us at Stand K42.
